extendedIngredients.name: instant vanilla pudding mix
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 package (3.4 ounces) instant vanilla pudding mix

extendedIngredients.name: pumpkin pie spice
extendedIngredients.originalString: Additional pumpkin pie spice for garnish

recipes.title: Pumpkin Pudding
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a bowl, combine milk, 1/2 cup cream, pudding mix and pie spice; whisk until thickened and smooth, about 2 minutes. Stir in pumpkin. Spoon into dessert dishes.                                                                                            Whip the remaining cream until stiff peaks form; place a dollop on each serving of pudding. Sprinkle with pie spice. Serve with gingersnaps if desired.                                        Yield: 4-6 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Pumpkin Pudding in  Country WomanNovember/December 1997, p37                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 serving (1 each) equals 249 calories, 17 g fat (10 g saturated fat), 63 mg cholesterol, 273 mg sodium, 22 g carbohydrate, 2 g fiber, 4 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a bowl, combine milk, 1/2 cup cream, pudding mix and pie spice; whisk until thickened and smooth, about 2 minutes. Stir in pumpkin. Spoon into dessert dishes.
Whip the remaining cream until stiff peaks form; place a dollop on each serving of pudding. Sprinkle with pie spice.
